title: Wyoming, USA - July 18, 2022: Tourists take photos of geysers on a boardwalk in Yellowstone National Park, partially obscured by the steam
description: Wyoming, USA - July 18, 2022: Tourists take photos of geysers on a boardwalk in Yellowstone National Park, partially obscured by the steam
author: m01229
generated_description: Visitors walk along a wooden boardwalk photographing active geothermal features while thick steam rises around them. The elevated walkway allows safe viewing of hot springs and geysers while protecting the fragile thermal environment. Dense clouds of steam partially obscure the tourists as they capture the natural spectacle.
